pullrequest.title: Added an IndexedMzML class to make random access of indexed MzML documents possible.

content.raw: If we choose to do option 1, after we define the Indexed derived class, we just replace the name of the base class with the Indexed class, and it seamlessly gets used in `read`. We can save the base class in a _name for testing purposes and for more internal inheritance schemes.
content.html: If we choose to do option 1, after we define the Indexed derived class, we just replace the name of the base class with the Indexed class, and it seamlessly gets used in read. We can save the base class in a _name for testing purposes and for more internal inheritance schemes.
